document_data.name: Ishen-Charac
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ishen-Charac''' was a bigger type of the heavier breed of [[horse]]s that were often used as warhorses. They were commonly found throughout [[Tymanther]], where they were prized and cherished by the [[dragonborn]].
document_data.Description: The Ishen-Charac were big, powerful wide-backed horses, specifically breed to be able to bear dragonborn riders.
document_data.History:
A few [[Thymari#Clans|dragonborn clans]] were known for breeding the Ishen-Charac, among them clans [[Clan Shestandeliath|Shestandeliath]] and [[clan Clethtinthtiallor|Clethtinthtiallor]].

Dragonborn didn't use their Ishen-Charac for war until the [[Invasion of Tymanther]] of [[1479 DR]], when the [[Lance Defenders]] implemented their first cavalry units on horseback.
